ns1:Asset.ns1:name: MWS2R3 - CM2012 - POST Config (SEC)
ns1:Asset.ns1:description: Needs to be triggered from SECONDARY server
ns1:Asset.ns1:body:
# Load Common functions . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 # Copy Common scripts to local profile Get-AppFiles "Common"
# Load Common functions . .\Logging.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\PlatformUtils.ps1
# get current script location $scriptPath = split-path -parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Definition $scriptName = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Name
ConfigureLogging $scriptPath $scriptName
######################################################################### # Main #########################################################################
#Use ArgList variable in Start-Process commands so embedded variables and env variables resolve
$DomainFQDN = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainFQDN")).value $DomainNetBIOS = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainNetBIOS")).value $ServiceAccountName = "$DomainNetBIOS\$env:CM_ServiceAccount" $ServiceAccountPwd = get-serviceAccountPassword -username $env:CM_ServiceAccount.ToLower() # Covert to lowercase as get-serviceAccountPassword function is case sensitive $PShEXE = "$PSHome\Powershell.exe"
If ($DomainFQDN -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $DomainFQDN cannot be determined'; EXIT 1} If ($DomainNetBIOS -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $DomainNetBIOS cannot be determined'; EXIT 1} If ($ServiceAccountName -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $ServiceAccountName cannot be determined'; EXIT 1} If ($ServiceAccountPwd -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $ServiceAccountPwd cannot be determined'; EXIT 1}
Get-ScheduledTask | Where-Object {$_.TaskName -eq "AgilityTask"} | Unregister-ScheduledTask -Confirm:$False #Cleanup existing tasks used by LaunchProcessAsUser function If (!(Test-Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\SMS\Setup")) {Write-Host 'ERROR: No ConfigMgr installation was detected. Exiting...'; EXIT 1}
Log "**** Starting: Secondary POST Install Config... ****" Log "`n"
Log "Installing POST ConfigMgr 2012 Updates..." Get-AppFiles "PC Devices\System Center\Server Provisioning\Common\ConfigMgr\Updates\ConfigMgr 2012\CU5 for ConfigMgr 2012 R2" $CUfile = "$ScriptPath\CM12-R2CU5-KB3054451-X64-ENU.exe" Log " **KB3054451 | CU5 for ConfigMgr 2012 R2" # Log file output to %windir%\Temp $arglist = "/Unattended /NoSQLTimeout /NoMOFTimeout" $ret = LaunchProcessAsUser "$CUfile" $arglist $ServiceAccountName $ServiceAccountPwd If ($ret -ne 0 -And $ret -ne 3010 -And $ret -ne 3001) {Log "ERROR: Exitcode = $ret. Failed to install ConfigMgr CU5. Exiting..."; EXIT 1} Log "`n"
Log "**** Finished: Secondary POST Install Config... ****"
